job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on leveraging existing AI tools to improve efficiency in software development tasks like coding, error detection, and feature development. It mentions 'AI-driven innovations' and 'AI-driven solutions' but does not detail the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of core AI models (LLMs, diffusion models, etc.) or the underlying AI infrastructure. The emphasis is on using AI as a productivity enhancer within traditional software engineering, rather than building AI systems themselves. This aligns with the definition of the 'Ambiguous' profile, which includes roles primarily focused on the 'USE of AI tools to enhance productivity' and traditional software engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing', 'develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions', 'creating robust, cloud-native applications', and 'enhance product functionality'. These are all core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement' points to software engineering efforts to improve existing products.
job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement

job_tasks.justification: Developing and deploying back-end solutions using serverless technologies and building cloud-native applications are explicit software development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications

job_tasks.justification: Conducting code reviews and collaborating with a global team to ensure best practices are standard software development and team collaboration practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards

job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI-driven solutions into cloud services is a software development task focused on incorporating external or pre-built AI capabilities into an application.
job_tasks.phrase: effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.' and 'enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement' indicates a focus on business outcomes and product improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Modernize our strategic product lines' implies understanding and contributing to the company's strategic direction.

soft_skills.phrase: coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing
